scheme_name: Scheme for Providing Employment Opportunities by Establishing Piggery, Sheep and Goat Units (General) under Mukhya Mantri Antyodaya Parivaar Utthan Yojana (Haryana)
description: This scheme, under the Mukhya Mantri Antyodaya Parivaar Utthan Yojana, provides financial assistance to establish poultry, piggery, sheep, and goat units to uplift economically weaker families.

benefits.unit_types: Poultry, piggery, sheep, and goat units

category_criteria: Open to economically weaker families under Antyodaya Yojana
eligibility.additional_criteria: Must be a resident of Haryana

special_notes: Part of the broader Antyodaya upliftment program
